comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool. This contract includes one or more amendments. This contract is a multi-year contract. Consultant to undertake groundwater and surface water monitoring, remedial options analysis, develop remedial action plan, design drawings and specifications and provide support during tendering process for remediation of the former Landfill 1 and Landfill 3 in the Frontenac Institution property in Kingston, Otario.
